about


Hi I’m Laura Juo-Hsin Chen! I enjoy realizing fantasy, with mixed virtual reality, doodle, and lots of handcrafts. My last project is MASK, a series of VR headsets explorying identity shifting.

Here’s the place where I document things of Programming From A to Z, a class taught by Daniel Shiffman at ITP.
